title: HELP!" You won't be allowed to join the queue because you're currently assigned to an existing game"
body: Hello guys. I'm having this problem for hours and still i can't solve it. I played Ascension(mode), the game ended and the stats screen came but it was all dark and the only think i could see was "Skip waiting for stats". Of course i skipped it. I wanted to start another game. I clicked on  Summoner's Rift ---> Normal ---> Solo. Unfortunately the error came " You will not be allowed to join the queue because you are currently assigned to an existing game.". I tried to fix it with uninstalling the game and didn't happen anything. I would be really happy if someone helps me with this problem. Thank you :) !

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue?  It seems that some players were having what we call a ghost game, which happens when the match can't tell our servers that it ended.  Looking over things, everything looks okay now but let me know.
I have the same problem, i have ,,reconnect screen" for about 3 hours {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
